name: DiCE WAY
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We made a simple puzzle game that fits the

'GMTK Game Jam 2022'
theme of "ROLL OF THE DICE"! This game is a simple game where you have to arrive according
to the number of destinations. You can only move on to the next stage
if the numbers on the two dice are correct!

----------------------------------------------------------------

- Control - Move the dice to 「W, A, S, D」 and the select is 「Space Bar」
You can also restart the stage with 「R」

--------------------------------------------

- Credit - Director: Kudeok
Designer: ACACIA,mk0216
Art: TIOYO
Sound: CYBer
